channel.title: Editing .xml files
channel.description: Ok I just started learning how to code, so yea im not great, I edited xml files like advert to say what I wanted it to say, also changed shops to sell the shit i want and say what I want etc... but im using wingzip and when i edit the xml file I then compress it with wingzip and copy it to the folder, deleting the old one, when I log on nothing is changed, what am I doing wrong, am I not changing everything I should or what? any help would be appreciated

item.title: Editing .xml files
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

ixl p0tz ixl:

OK so after that i compress it and re run server right? any way u can give me an example of how I should go about changing shops… i changed what the shop keeper says and what items they sale where it says ----> Bronze Axe<----- i replaced that with the item id I was putting there, so it looked like this… ----> Rune Chain<----- I then replaced the bronze axe id with the rune chains id, compressed it and copied it to my folder… it didnt work, any help?

You REALLY need to learn about simple sentence structure.

You could give SAX a go (a Java library, in the JDK 1.6)

Read full topic

item.title: Editing .xml files
item.dc:creator: @Jaghetermario Jaghetermario
item.description:
@Jaghetermario wrote:

haha i just remeber that u played on my server firescape.mine.nu

ok follow this!

  1. remove the compressed shopdef
    2 edit the shopdef.xml [i will take the first shop from my files]

<ItemShopDef> <!-- Rune pl8 --> <item>401</item> <amount>1</amount> <price>50000</price> </ItemShopDef>

so it has to look like! do not make the name to long like rune plate skirt
3.saved the updated XML
4.compress it
5.run the server

Read full topic

item.title: Editing .xml files

OK so after that i compress it and re run server right? any way u can give me an example of how I should go about changing shops… i changed what the shop keeper says and what items they sale where it says ----> Bronze Axe<----- i replaced that with the item id I was putting there, so it looked like this… ----> Rune Chain<----- I then replaced the bronze axe id with the rune chains id, compressed it and copied it to my folder… it didnt work, any help?

item.title: Editing .xml files
item.dc:creator: @Jaghetermario Jaghetermario
item.description:
@Jaghetermario wrote:

first of all u can’t name that coding. a 11 year old could change stuffs like that.

and nja i have a friend who made the same problem he tho he made it all right but he didn’t
you have by accurate to make it right and dont make it fast take your time!
now most ppl doing it wrong cosue thw dont know where or what

i quess u useing divine or xpk
if it is rscd v25 i would recommand to change to divine pk

ok i will explain how i change my npc!
i think many things the locations of the npc r in the DEF folders but its not.
in the locs folders it is.
usely i use this site to see the npc id
rune-server.org/showthread.php?t=76733
then if we wanna set a monster you have to go down to lets say its a sections
its looks like this you see the respan time down there?
ok and u have to be vary careful the startX and startY, if you do just a little mistake you will not be able to see it so i always start with to set them to the same maxY and maX just do see if the got spawned

<NPCLoc> <id>65</id> <startX>207</startX> <startY>434</startY> <minX>205</minX> <maxX>208</maxX> <minY>433</minY> <maxY>435</maxY> <respawnTime>20</respawnTime> </NPCLoc>

Read full topic
